card.name: Earth Tanto
card.description: An earth-elemental short sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Earth Wakizashi
card.description: An earth-elemental medium sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Earth Katana
card.description: An earth-elemental standard sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Curved Earth Blade
card.description: An earth-elemental sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tile below.

card.name: Wide Earth Sword
card.description: A, earth-elemental sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Earth Naginata
card.description: A, earth-elemental spear that hits 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Kanobo
card.description: A studded, earth-elemental mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Hammer Slam
card.description: Slams and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Hammer Swing
card.description: Slams and stuns the enemies in the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below..

card.name: Single Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in all three rows.

card.name: Single Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in all the rows.

card.name: Single Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in all the rows.

card.name: Earth Naginata Throw
card.description: An earth-elemental spear thrown at the tiles in front of you, piercing the first enemy and stopping at the second.

card.name: Earth Throw
card.description: Throws a piercing rock chunk in front of you.

card.name: Earth Swing
card.description: Throws two piercing rock chunks in the row front and below you.

card.name: Earth Barrage
card.description: Throws piercing rock chunks downs all the rows.

card.name: Tremor
card.description: The earth swells two tiles in front of you and destroys the third tile.
